Data Fields
EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S Struct Reference

VLAN FID entry parameters definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_TBL sub-command. More...

#include <emac_ioctl.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t fid
 
uint8_t hostMember

uint8_t p2Tagged

uint8_t floodToHost
 

Detailed Description

VLAN FID entry parameters definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_TBL sub-command.

Field Documentation

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::fid

filtering identifier field, this 8 bit field is included in SA and DA hashes as part of FDB function

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::floodToHost

if set, send un-registered MC packet to host port

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::hostMember

if set, forward to the host port

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::hostTagged

if set, VLAN tag should be added to host port packet being transmitted, if not set, then strip VLAN tag

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::p1Member

if set, forware to physical port 1 of the switch

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::p1Tagged

if set, VLAN tag should be added to phsyical port 1 packet being transmitted, if not set, then strip VLAN tag

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::p2Member

if set, forware to physical port 2 of the switch

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::p2Tagged

if set, VLAN tag should be added to physical port 2 packet being transmitted, if not set, then strip VLAN tag

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_S::streamVid

if set, VLAN is part of stream FDB, Bypass UC/MC FDB
